item.title: First Script! Auto Google Search! :) IE + FF!
item.dc:creator: @aznrx aznrx
item.description:
@aznrx wrote:

[quote=“phonnygoblin, post:8, topic:11486”]program new;
begin
openwebpage(‘runescape’);
end.[/quote]

change
openwebpage(‘runescape’);

to

openwebpage(‘http://www.runescape.com’);

item.source: First Script! Auto Google Search! :) IE + FF!

item.title: First Script! Auto Google Search! :) IE + FF!
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Ok, this is my first script, and what it does is opens up internet explorer, goes to google, and types in your search query, and searches!

You can also change the search engine, but I’ve only tested it with google, and you need the default internet explorer theme, or pretty close to it.

Hopefully I’ll update this so that it works with firefox, too.

-----------UPDATES-----------

  1. Tested it with the firefox homepage (http://www.google.com/firefox) and it works.
  2. Now works with FireFox!!! Try it out, just change the browser variable!
  3. The script now finds both icons even if they’re highlighted!

[scar]{
Welcome to Weibs’ Google Search Script.
This is my first script, so feedback would be great!

—SETUP—

  1. Pretty simple, make sure the IE or FF icon
    is visible somewhere on your desktop.
  2. Don’t need to specify a window.
  3. Additional setup on lines 30 - 32.

—UPDATES—

  1. Tested the firefox hompage search engine (http://www.google.com/firefox)
    although this script does not work with firefox itself, yet.

  2. Now compatible with FireFox!! See the setup below!!

  3. It now finds both IE and FF icons even if they’re highlighted!

—OTHER INFO—
This script was made by me, Weibs, although I did look at some other
scripts, but just for help with some of the functions.

Hopefully this script turns out to be somewhat useful
}

program googleSearch;

const
//SETUP HERE!

browser=2;//1 = Internet Explorer. 2 = FireFox.
searchEngine=‘www.google.com’;//Favorite search engine. Google Recommended!
searchQuery=‘Google’;//Whatever you want to search.

//END SETUP! Don’t touch below unless you know what you’re doing

var
ie, ie2, x, y: Integer;
ieAddressBar, x2, y2: Integer;
ff, ff2, a, b: Integer;
ffAddressBar, a2, b2: Integer;

procedure openIE;
begin
ie := BitmapFromString(9, 18, ‘z78DA95925DAEDD300884B714F36’ +
‘39B4730B0FF2575929C5695CE436F896445D6C7304C725D7759E5’ +
‘2C8BD9289F5DDD7BA4F732CAD3D75BDE60D6D45C4DBE8E65B8B58’ +
‘097CE069ADCEC945EE7E56D9ECC564FED2127478B714AB98F76F0’ +
‘7A30C623A3ECE5F77524434F4A93C04F2F9E1E3576151C2D3B057’ +
‘E43815E7ED5E174D5A41E3A1EBEA2FBA2BDCC63613A784CAFF5F1’ +
‘A347C10B744A095B2CA1B35A5982EA10E9B5D40EBAF8E5E3DE979’ +
‘50F92813E831F477AF28CDD830ADE9C60D13EFBBEA5155543AFBC’ +
‘1EFD9BD750B86ACF4A0A5F65B4AD7F6FB13932430E9C4CB90E3D7’ +
‘EF4A37F1EDEC99D6A92199288098B2933BC027E085BEBC3E7C3BB’ +
‘6B6D90088C104331C98ED4C931D2189FA6376FF817BE3E7E26F86’ +
‘D89482606104EC9429CC302796A15471C4C91E026B842EC8FFE84’ +
‘FE86FEB2F99C5203F1201CEEC836764C992C8EFF07DEE8DE0253E’ +
‘E2DF68767BCDF272B22C194EC80374602EC5E0D875441890FBF29’ +
‘D0351F5EA0A3F7B9678E7DFDF4790B6A48B27F5C7FBAB8D6DF37D’ +
‘FF5DDC517BAF6F7FD3FBAA6ADCAFF9E1586C07E017467DF33’);
If(findBitmap(ie, x, y))Then
begin
movemousesmooth(x, y);
wait(500);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(100);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
Writeln(‘Opening Internet Explorer…’);
wait(2000);
Writeln(‘Internet Explorer opened!’);
end;
If(findBitmap(ie, x, y)=false)Then
begin
ie2 := BitmapFromString(7, 22, ‘z78DAA5D15B6E03210C05D02D31’ +
‘3C6CF8C45CB3FF25F502A34AD1B469A43A923F26073F208415161’ +
‘13D5846C7B48086D97C0C38BF77C7109799CC61DE8FE9639B3E14’ +
‘161EC12399C6B69191D19EA6CA28A8BD4369F288507AF35B9AFB3’ +
‘563D575B6064A6B7524B45E913DBED4C9FC5E6B5C46AB75D41F7A’ +
‘A571416984A6738FAEC912E4C5149B109A4CD36C306713540DBC8’ +
‘F720C67681EEAC569579D6592956D2E88F8DAFB489DEBB658C776’ +
‘AF72D739A6301B92BA35E836771D99B701B28077936474C5B5F71’ +
‘A5A384FD7EBEE754C433C86398FA9627557E3BDE97A07F9AE23DB’ +
‘9423112865CBB0FA729E3555A3C42D333356665FBEB9C63E39EDB’ +
‘5E55CEF402FDB67CEE0AC1C6BF8FB77627E10E16D3CE56FA7FE53’ +
‘F3F9EF7BF9C9469FEFFE055B44D43D’);
if(findBitmap(ie2, x, y))Then
begin
movemousesmooth(x, y);
wait(500);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(100);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
Writeln(‘Opening Internet Explorer…’);
wait(2000);
Writeln(‘Internet Explorer opened!’);
end;
end;
end;

procedure openFF;
begin
ff := BitmapFromString(1, 20, ‘BABAD9AFADCBABA7C4A68F9EA469’ +
‘4BAF672FE28321E38728E07C23DC6C1AD86115D55913CE450FC22’ +
‘4089516167D414E808080FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF’);
if(findBitmap(ff, a, b))Then
begin
movemousesmooth(a, b);
wait(500);
clickmouse(a,b,true);
wait(100);
clickmouse(a,b,true);
Writeln(‘Opening FireFox…’);
wait(2000);
Writeln(‘FireFox opened!’);
end;
If(findBitmap(ff, x, y)=false)Then
begin
ff2 := BitmapFromString(12, 23, ‘z78DA9554598E1C3B0CBB92572’ +
‘D9F5AECFB1FE951D5333D1D2041F2AA00C1A8B26852A21CD36F4E’ +
‘EDDA63918BFAD847D40E7571BB64DA7DF25076625675F98CD2BDC’ +
‘591E59214C787CD7D99F4227718D392F4C65DC937BB8A771B9A2A’ +
‘C19692B19CAD49D3E306849D4B66C5B836858D94B5A96BDAC04BE’ +
‘6360D791E7A64C63120C6361692AECD1AA75AF1310D6CD3F40C55’ +
‘E115893D2B9B5D6DD97D69E4F0AD11A64E374213DA864EB9AC50D’ +
‘D8123C06946C17C6CC5068EF206CE7ECE15A9F5E244EEE1FACB64’ +
‘AFA821C497452674750DF707878003B4DAC333A008AC5C831B627’ +
‘130153A21BA1F1C227480372D542EA86A932C9CBC9979EB46BDEB’ +
‘AC8B5CA37C6269A975E556DC40AB3D077D13DA31E530458A629D3’ +
‘ED5B9CB357ECE8D37823E51BE10BE710C9C1B7EB0648E98861363’ +
‘7A93AD860E747880BF103E717E98BC58BDEA4C4FD7D2373685301’ +
‘CC7943A2C78588BF1C6F9645238565A1E840D6FA09A39EC804128’ +
‘5891C9B686F2A2E7DCE4FAFCD052B1104417A51F31D44465D3F52’ +
‘1E8A9B7EA181C49DA61B789BD0EF70677F0D96F2D6019AC93C284’ +
‘9CA66D22EA703753E745F0184D4A21825A09E02CE870214B3AF0D’ +
‘90F1FE060869C4099040801B4EE9D302DDAF8A0DBD5E1C20DF031’ +
‘B8061DC0DC5D44F1FB5593471770140E7972B19ED41CCCA941297’ +
‘8C2F8023E70157457C46E499804FE919FCA549CA889209791DB30’ +
‘74D0CDA770E4A0105A758BA9939B1BA294D3B814393C5CDDF9C67’ +
‘9ADB70CEAA1880DC5DA586F59E069F8A251558EB73FCB1513FDF3’ +
‘A73BFE0B2B7D7D8163D73B820FFC0C29365169CCF9D38BC383960’ +
‘9E605B78A36647DB2FA7163C5FECCD740F5702EF298A08B8C06AA’ +
‘18B4B8ED4B7097B4BFBFAF07F80117813F0B72973430ABCA2FC22’ +
‘577FFE179E3D484BAE2EE808AC4D50A4938E74A97D9FEF0FC16C7’ +
‘9EFB24BEEE998DF88DCC9F3BFF8AF3729A7E44CC4EDD57DCFF079’ +
‘FEA63BC3BC2F4E9BDFC0FA5677C85’);
if(findBitmap(ff2, x, y))Then
begin
movemousesmooth(x, y);
wait(500);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(100);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
Writeln(‘Opening FireFox…’);
wait(2000);
Writeln(‘FireFox opened!’);
end;
end;
end;

procedure findIEAddressBar;
begin
ieAddressBar := BitmapFromString(30, 17, ‘z78DAEDD64D0AC32010’ +
‘86E12BD56889B374FCC6FB1FA9F66761190C42CDD08009BC10999’ +
‘8876C9252661E14E89EB6CF45A8E73EAD7AFF13CC92251737AB46’ +
‘665F4F6EEB8B87875E1F99B137BF256D7BDADE8C8D198424A1AD5’ +
‘61DAFB735323B6C72D3D5C22F6DE72E1B73CE19E05EB5F678FE1F’ +
‘CCAD7C64D2C85C9F8634ABCBBCCCCB3C6E0620E2F477E1A7BEF63’ +
‘CC35CFF675042E498890824896735A6C8441C7867D90B81E95AA5’ +
‘E7AB77D7EA03E79E13EE’);
if(findBitmap(ieAddressBar, x2, y2))Then
begin
movemousesmooth(x2,y2);
wait(500);
clickmouse(x2,y2,true);
Writeln(‘Found the address bar.’);
end;
end;

procedure findFFAddressBar;
begin
ffAddressBar := BitmapFromString(12, 19, ‘z78DAED934B0AC330’ +
‘0C44AF54FF68B4B435D2FD8F54B7862250924694EE2AC15B8CE1D’ +
‘90B8FEA73A852EB59D70CE5B9517A4F9D7B0FF3671E61614D51EE’ +
‘78CADC6159B4A0C0E796E79E65B03CBAC57B40E8522DBDCDE73B9’ +
‘E842C374F6F3BF73033308EE80D2B8F7AACCD263B9E79821EE5DF’ +
‘73DD034024F97F7885EF6E42EB3636262290F411656FF361F97BC’ +
‘EA6B557E32CAB63FBC4073F93570C’);
if(findBitmap(ffAddressBar, a2, b2))Then
begin
movemousesmooth(a2,b2);
wait(500);
clickmouse(a2,b2,true);
Writeln(‘Found the address bar.’);
end;
end;

procedure goToSearchEngine;
begin
SendKeys(searchEngine);
wait(500);
SendKeys(Chr(13));
Writeln(‘Opened Google.’);
end;

procedure search;
begin
SendKeys(searchQuery);
wait(500);
SendKeys(Chr(13));
Writeln(‘Searching…’);
wait(1000);
Writeln(‘Search done! Thank you for using this script!’);
end;

begin
if(browser=1)Then
begin
openIE;
wait(5000);
findIEAddressBar;
end;
if(browser=2)Then
begin
openFF;
wait(5000);
findFFAddressBar;
end;
wait(500);
goToSearchEngine;
wait(2000);
search;
end.[/scar]

I hope it works for you, and please leave some feedback :D!

-Weibs

EDIT: Forgot to add that if something doesn’t work, try increasing some of the times at the end like this…

begin
openIE;
wait(5000); ----Increase that if your internet loads slow.
findAddressBar;
wait(500);
goToGoogle;
wait(2000); ----Increas that if Google loads slow.
search;
end.

Read full topic
